query: UPDATE blog_posts SET image = '/blog/' || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(slug, 'resume-writing-tips-australia', 'resume-writing-tips'), 'ats-resume-optimization', 'ats-resume-optimization'), 'linkedin-profile-optimization', 'linkedin-optimization') || '.jpg' WHERE image IS NULL OR image = '';
